comments:
Students in CIS 120 generally found that the material covered in lecture was not strongly correlated to the content and difficulty of the homework assignments. They also had difficulty completing homework within the one-hour time limit for some assignments. A few students mentioned that they had problems with TAs who were unqualified or unhelpful. The course seems to require students to self-teach outside of lecture and recitation to do well on graded assignments.
Note: Less than 25% of students enrolled in this course submitted a written comment on their evaluation.
